title: Beats connected but won't work with calls
content: In the last day or two my Beats will connect to the phone, and I can listen to audio, but won't work when I try to make or answer calls. The phone isn't even giving me the option to allow calls with this, or any other, Bluetooth device. Thoughts? Everything was working fine until a couple days ago.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
